answers.author: Ann Mahoney
answers.text:
Marcy, 
Two other ICMA publications also might  provide what you're looking for. These are Managing Local Government Services (http://bookstore.icma.org/Managing_Local_Government_Serv_P151C13.cfm)
 and its companion piece, Managing Local Government: Cases in Effectiveness (http://bookstore.icma.org/Managing_Local_Government_Cas_P1886C29.cfm). The links take you to the bookstore, where you'll find a description and links to the table of contents and an excerpt. Hope this is helpful.

answers.text:

author: Marcy Krum
text: I am looking for the best book to review containing best management practices for local government managers (budgets, personnel, elected officials, citizen participation, policies, personnel reviews, finance, missions, unions, asset management, etc).
title: Best management book for local government
